t: How Amazon hit one Billion Electric Deliveries in the US | EV Magazine
s: January 7, 2025 - Amid the hustle and bustle of the holiday season, Amazon has reached an extraordinary milestone: its 1,000,000,000th delivery in the United States made via an electric delivery vehicle. Yes, that's one billion packages delivered sustainably, thanks to Amazon's growing fleet of EVs.
